body:
Hi,

I am working on Ladybug to bounce Raytrace off of a curved surface. I added an additional surface adjacent to the curved surface, and would like Raytrace to bounce off of both surfaces. Is this possible?



Please take a look at the attached drawing.



Thank you!

attachments.name: Raytrace bounce off of two surfaces.JPG

topic: Raytrace bounce off of two surfaces
